sentences.en: a closet full of beautiful clothes
Don’t let her closet herself away in her room.
sentences.cn: 别让她把自己关在房间里。

sentences.en: He ensconced himself in the closet in order to eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 他藏在壁橱里,以便偷听.

sentences.en: He got his winter jacket from the closet and dropped it on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 他从衣橱里取出冬天穿的夹克，把它扔到沙发上。
他是个秘密的法西斯分子。

sentences.en: He went to the water closet.
I suspect he's a closet fascist.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他是秘密的法西斯分子。

sentences.en: I want to put some of my good hangers in Grandpa's closet.
sentences.cn: 我想在爷爷的衣橱放几个好的衣架.

sentences.en: I'll clear out that closet for you.
sentences.cn: 我要替你把那个小衣橱清理出来.

sentences.en: If you want a towel, look in the linen closet.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要毛巾, 可到放毛巾和床单的壁橱里去找.

sentences.en: It's just an old rag I had in the closet.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是我挂在壁橱里的旧衣服罢了.

sentences.en: She cleared out all her old clothes from the closet.
sentences.cn: 她把她所有的旧衣服从壁橱里拿出来.

sentences.en: She packaged up the old clothes and put them in the closet.
sentences.cn: 她把旧衣服包成一包放到衣橱里.

sentences.en: The closet is full of broken toys and other nonsense.
sentences.cn: 壁橱里都是些破损的玩具及其它无价值的东西.

sentences.en: The closet things, the dominant pattern are usually unanswerable.
sentences.cn: 最贴心的感受, 起主导作用的心理,往往是很难解释的.

sentences.en: The old coat has been kicking around the closet for years.
sentences.cn: 这件旧外套在橱中闲放已好几年了.

sentences.en: The old coat has shopworn in the closet for years.
sentences.cn: 这件旧外套在橱中闲放已好几年了。

trans.tran_en: a cupboard built into the wall of a room from the floor to the ceiling
to shut someone in a room away from other people in order to discuss something private, to be alone etc
